name: Biryani
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
ingredients: 4 potatoes medium, washed and diced into small cubes,1 red pepper washed, diced into small cubes,2 jalapeno chilli washed, diced finely,1½ cup cilantro fresh, washed, finely chopped,including stems,2 tsp olive oil extra virgin
